verification_methods.description: All individuals required to be verified must be verified using either:

requirements: one government-issued photo ID (valid passport or UK photocard driving licence)
one proof of address (utility bill, bank or building society statement, or council tax statement dated within the last 3 months)

generalRules.mandatory_outcomes: All CDD actions set out below are mandatory outcomes, not options

edd_approval.rule: Where EDD is stated as required, MLRO approval is mandatory before the matter proceeds

exclusions.description: This ruleset does not apply to the following - such matters must be assessed directly by reference to the Eventus AML PCPs and escalated to the MLRO where required
excluded_types: LLPs or partnerships with trust or nominee partners
professional partnerships operating in high-risk jurisdictions
any structure requiring bespoke MLRO assessment
any client type not covered by the Individual, UK Private Limited Company, or UK LLP/Partnership CMLRAs
